name: Alex Seifert
bio: Alex is a developer, a drummer and an amateur historian. He enjoys being on the stage in front of a large crowd, but also sitting in a room alone, programming something or writing about history.

name: Kyle Seifert
bio: As an avid writer and history geek, Kyle has spent countless hours binge-watching history documentaries on everything from ancient Egypt to modern warfare. When heâ€™s not writing, he enjoys playing online games and spending time with his family enjoying outdoor activities such as rollerblading, hiking, and soccer.
